title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson 'hooked up in the past' during their friendship
text:
Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson reportedly 'hooked up' long before they started dating each other.

According to ET, the pair have been 'friends for years' and occasionally strayed into romantic territory during this time.

But things never became serious because they always found themselves in committed relationships with other people.

They have history! Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson reportedly 'hooked up' long before they started dating each other. Pictured in 2014

'They have hooked up in the past... They both just want to have fun and are open and honest with each other about that,' a source told ET.

'Miley and Cody talk to each other about everything. They are very close and feel comfortable sharing details with each other about their lives.'

However, the pair apparently have 'no plans to start dating each other exclusively.'

Friends with benefits? According to ET, the pair have been 'friends for years' and occasionally strayed into romantic territory during this time

Another source told OK! Australia that Miley, 26, is 'basically living out [her] fantasy' by dating the 22-year-old Australian singer.

'They have always been attracted to one another but couldn't act on it because they were both taken,' said the insider.

It comes after footage resurfaced this week of Cody aged 15 revealing that Miley was his 'childhood celebrity crush'.

Young love! 'They have hooked up in the past... They both just want to have fun and are open and honest with each other about that,' said a source

In a 2012 interview, Cody said he 'knew all the words' to Miley's songs and considered her to be the 'most dateable Disney star'.

The couple went public with their romance last week, following Miley's break-up with Brody Jenner's ex Kaitlynn Carter.

She briefly dated Kaitlynn after separating from her husband Liam Hemsworth, whom she married in December last year.

'Courtesy of baby': The couple went public with their romance last week, following Miley's break-up with Brody Jenner's ex Kaitlynn Carter
description: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson reportedly 'hooked up' long before they started dating each other.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
